ayah: الٓمٓ
ayah_translit: alif-lam-meem
ayah_english: Alif Lam Mim

ayah: تَنزِيلُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَا رَيۡبَ فِيهِ مِن رَّبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_translit: tanzilu al-kitabi la rayba fihi min rabbi al-'alamina
ayah_english: (The) revelation (of) the Book (there is) no doubt about it from (the) Lord (of) the worlds

ayah: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ ٱفۡتَرَىٰهُۚ بَلۡ هُوَ ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ لِتُنذِرَ قَوۡمٗا مَّآ أَتَىٰهُم مِّن نَّذِيرٖ مِّن قَبۡلِكَ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَهۡتَدُونَ
ayah_translit: am yaquluna if'tarahu bal huwa al-haqu min rabbika litundhira qawman ma atahum min nadhirin min qablika la'allahum yahtaduna
ayah_english: Or (do) they say He invented it Nay it (is) the truth from your Lord that you may warn a people not has come to them any warner before you before you so that they may be guided

ayah: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٖ ثُمَّ ٱسۡتَوَىٰ عَلَى ٱلۡعَرۡشِۖ مَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِهِۦ مِن وَلِيّٖ وَلَا شَفِيعٍۚ أَفَلَا تَتَذَكَّرُونَ
ayah_translit: al-lahu alladhi khalaqa al-samawati wal-arda wama baynahuma fi sittati ayyamin thumma is'tawa ala al-'arshi ma lakum min dunihi min waliyyin wala shafi'in afala tatadhakkaruna
ayah_english: Allah (is) the One Who created the heavens and the earth and whatever (is) between them in six periods Then established Himself on the Throne Not for you besides Him besides Him any protector and not any intercessor Then will not you take heed

ayah: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٖ ثُمَّ ٱسۡتَوَىٰ عَلَى ٱلۡعَرۡشِۖ مَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِهِۦ مِن وَلِيّٖ وَلَا شَفِيعٍۚ أَفَلَا تَتَذَكَّرُونَ

ayah: يُدَبِّرُ ٱلۡأَمۡرَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ إِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ثُمَّ يَعۡرُجُ إِلَيۡهِ فِي يَوۡمٖ كَانَ مِقۡدَارُهُۥٓ أَلۡفَ سَنَةٖ مِّمَّا تَعُدُّونَ
ayah_translit: yudabbiru al-amra mina al-samai ila al-ardi thumma ya'ruju ilayhi fi yawmin kana miq'daruhu alfa sanatin mimma ta'udduna
ayah_english: He regulates the affair of the heaven to the earth then it will ascend to Him in a Day (the) measure of which is (the) measure of which is a thousand years of what you count

ayah_translit: dhalika alimu al-ghaybi wal-shahadati al-'azizu al-rahimu

ayah: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَحۡسَنَ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ خَلَقَهُۥۖ وَبَدَأَ خَلۡقَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنِ مِن طِينٖ
ayah_translit: alladhi ahsana kulla shayin khalaqahu wabada-a khalqa al-insani min tinin
ayah_english: The One Who made good every thing He created and He began (the) creation (of) man from clay

ayah: ثُمَّ جَعَلَ نَسۡلَهُۥ مِن سُلَٰلَةٖ مِّن مَّآءٖ مَّهِينٖ

ayah: ثُمَّ سَوَّىٰهُ وَنَفَخَ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِهِۦۖ وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرَ وَٱلۡأَفۡـِٔدَةَۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَشۡكُرُونَ
ayah_translit: thumma sawwahu wanafakha fihi min ruhihi waja'ala lakumu al-sam'a wal-absara wal-afidata qalilan ma tashkuruna
ayah_english: Then He fashioned him and breathed into him from His spirit and made for you the hearing and the sight and feelings little [what] thanks you give

ayah: وَقَالُوٓاْ أَءِذَا ضَلَلۡنَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَءِنَّا لَفِي خَلۡقٖ جَدِيدِۭۚ بَلۡ هُم بِلِقَآءِ رَبِّهِمۡ كَٰفِرُونَ
ayah_translit: waqalu a-idha dalalna fi al-ardi a-inna lafi khalqin jadidin bal hum biliqai rabbihim kafiruna
ayah_english: And they say Is (it) when we are lost in the earth will we certainly be in a creation new Nay they in (the) meeting (of) their Lord (are) disbelievers

ayah: ۞قُلۡ يَتَوَفَّىٰكُم مَّلَكُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِ ٱلَّذِي وُكِّلَ بِكُمۡ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمۡ تُرۡجَعُونَ
ayah_translit: qul yatawaffakum malaku al-mawti alladhi wukkila bikum thumma ila rabbikum tur'ja'una
ayah_english: Say Will take your soul (the) Angel (of) the death the one who has been put in charge of you Then to your Lord you will be returned

ayah: ۞قُلۡ يَتَوَفَّىٰكُم مَّلَكُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِ ٱلَّذِي وُكِّلَ بِكُمۡ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمۡ تُرۡجَعُونَ
ayah_translit: qul yatawaffakum malaku al-mawti alladhi wukkila bikum thumma ila rabbikum tur'ja'una
ayah_english: Say Will take your soul (the) Angel (of) the death the one who has been put in charge of you Then to your Lord you will be returned

ayah: ۞قُلۡ يَتَوَفَّىٰكُم مَّلَكُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِ ٱلَّذِي وُكِّلَ بِكُمۡ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمۡ تُرۡجَعُونَ

ayah_english: Say Will take your soul (the) Angel (of) the death the one who has been put in charge of you Then to your Lord you will be returned

ayah: وَلَوۡ تَرَىٰٓ إِذِ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ نَاكِسُواْ رُءُوسِهِمۡ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ رَبَّنَآ أَبۡصَرۡنَا وَسَمِعۡنَا فَٱرۡجِعۡنَا نَعۡمَلۡ صَٰلِحًا إِنَّا مُوقِنُونَ
ayah_translit: walaw tara idhi al-muj'rimuna nakisu ruusihim inda rabbihim rabbana absarna wasami'na fa-ir'ji'na na'mal salihan inna muqinuna
ayah_english: And if you (could) see when the criminals (will) hang their heads before their Lord Our Lord we have seen and we have heard so return us we will do righteous (deeds) Indeed we (are now) certain

ayah: وَلَوۡ شِئۡنَا لَأٓتَيۡنَا كُلَّ نَفۡسٍ هُدَىٰهَا وَلَٰكِنۡ حَقَّ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ مِنِّي لَأَمۡلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنَ ٱلۡجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ أَجۡمَعِينَ
ayah_translit: walaw shi'na laatayna kulla nafsin hudaha walakin haqqa al-qawlu minni la-amla-anna jahannama mina al-jinati wal-nasi ajma'ina
ayah_english: And if We (had) willed surely We (would) have given every soul its guidance but (is) true the Word from Me that I will surely fill Hell with the jinn and the men together

ayah: وَلَوۡ شِئۡنَا لَأٓتَيۡنَا كُلَّ نَفۡسٍ هُدَىٰهَا وَلَٰكِنۡ حَقَّ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ مِنِّي لَأَمۡلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنَ ٱلۡجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ أَجۡمَعِينَ

ayah: وَلَوۡ شِئۡنَا لَأٓتَيۡنَا كُلَّ نَفۡسٍ هُدَىٰهَا وَلَٰكِنۡ حَقَّ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ مِنِّي لَأَمۡلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنَ ٱلۡجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ أَجۡمَعِينَ

ayah: فَذُوقُواْ بِمَا نَسِيتُمۡ لِقَآءَ يَوۡمِكُمۡ هَٰذَآ إِنَّا نَسِينَٰكُمۡۖ وَذُوقُواْ عَذَابَ ٱلۡخُلۡدِ بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: fadhuqu bima nasitum liqaa yawmikum hadha inna nasinakum wadhuqu adhaba al-khul'di bima kuntum ta'maluna
ayah_english: So taste because you forgot (the) meeting (of) this Day of yours (of) this Day of yours Indeed, We have forgotten you And taste (the) punishment (of) eternity for what you used (to) do

ayah: إِنَّمَا يُؤۡمِنُ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ذُكِّرُواْ بِهَا خَرُّواْۤ سُجَّدٗاۤ وَسَبَّحُواْ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّهِمۡ وَهُمۡ لَا يَسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ۩
ayah_translit: innama yu'minu biayatina alladhina idha dhukkiru biha kharru sujjadan wasabbahu bihamdi rabbihim wahum la yastakbiruna
ayah_english: Only believe in Our Verses those who when they are reminded of them fall down prostrating and glorify (the) praises (of) their Lord and they are not arrogant are not arrogant

ayah: إِنَّمَا يُؤۡمِنُ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ذُكِّرُواْ بِهَا خَرُّواْۤ سُجَّدٗاۤ وَسَبَّحُواْ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّهِمۡ وَهُمۡ لَا يَسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ۩

ayah: تَتَجَافَىٰ جُنُوبُهُمۡ عَنِ ٱلۡمَضَاجِعِ يَدۡعُونَ رَبَّهُمۡ خَوۡفٗا وَطَمَعٗا وَمِمَّا رَزَقۡنَٰهُمۡ يُنفِقُونَ
ayah_translit: tatajafa junubuhum ani al-madaji'i yad'una rabbahum khawfan watama'an wamimma razaqnahum yunfiquna
ayah_english: Forsake their sides from (their) beds they call their Lord (in) fear and hope and out of what We have provided them they spend

ayah: فَلَا تَعۡلَمُ نَفۡسٞ مَّآ أُخۡفِيَ لَهُم مِّن قُرَّةِ أَعۡيُنٖ جَزَآءَۢ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: fala ta'lamu nafsun ma ukh'fiya lahum min qurrati a'yunin jazaan bima kanu ya'maluna
ayah_english: And not knows a soul what is hidden for them of (the) comfort (for) the eyes (as) a reward for what they used (to) do

ayah: أَفَمَن كَانَ مُؤۡمِنٗا كَمَن كَانَ فَاسِقٗاۚ لَّا يَسۡتَوُۥنَ
ayah_translit: afaman kana mu'minan kaman kana fasiqan la yastawuna
ayah_english: Then is one who is a believer like (him) who is defiantly disobedient Not they are equal

ayah: أَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ فَلَهُمۡ جَنَّـٰتُ ٱلۡمَأۡوَىٰ نُزُلَۢا بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: amma alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati falahum jannatu al-mawa nuzulan bima kanu ya'maluna
ayah_english: As for those who believe and do righteous deeds then for them (are) Gardens (of) Refuge (as) hospitality for what they used (to) do

ayah: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ فَسَقُواْ فَمَأۡوَىٰهُمُ ٱلنَّارُۖ كُلَّمَآ أَرَادُوٓاْ أَن يَخۡرُجُواْ مِنۡهَآ أُعِيدُواْ فِيهَا وَقِيلَ لَهُمۡ ذُوقُواْ عَذَابَ ٱلنَّارِ ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-amma alladhina fasaqu famawahumu al-naru kullama aradu an yakhruju min'ha u'idu fiha waqila lahum dhuqu adhaba al-nari alladhi kuntum bihi tukadhibuna
ayah_english: But as for those who are defiantly disobedient then their refuge (is) the Fire Every time they wish to come out from it they (will) be returned in it and it (will) be said to them Taste (the) punishment (of) the Fire which you used (to) [in it] deny

ayah: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ فَسَقُواْ فَمَأۡوَىٰهُمُ ٱلنَّارُۖ كُلَّمَآ أَرَادُوٓاْ أَن يَخۡرُجُواْ مِنۡهَآ أُعِيدُواْ فِيهَا وَقِيلَ لَهُمۡ ذُوقُواْ عَذَابَ ٱلنَّارِ ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

ayah: وَلَنُذِيقَنَّهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلۡأَدۡنَىٰ دُونَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلۡأَكۡبَرِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ
ayah_translit: walanudhiqannahum mina al-'adhabi al-adna duna al-'adhabi al-akbari la'allahum yarji'una
ayah_english: And surely We will let them taste of the punishment the nearer before the punishment the greater so that they may return

ayah: وَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِمَّن ذُكِّرَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّهِۦ ثُمَّ أَعۡرَضَ عَنۡهَآۚ إِنَّا مِنَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ مُنتَقِمُونَ
ayah_translit: waman azlamu mimman dhukkira biayati rabbihi thumma a'rada anha inna mina al-muj'rimina muntaqimuna
ayah_english: And who (is) more unjust than (he) who is reminded of (the) Verses (of) his Lord then he turns away from them Indeed We from the criminals (will) take retribution

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ فَلَا تَكُن فِي مِرۡيَةٖ مِّن لِّقَآئِهِۦۖ وَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ هُدٗى لِّبَنِيٓ إِسۡرَـٰٓءِيلَ
ayah_translit: walaqad atayna musa al-kitaba fala takun fi mir'yatin min liqaihi waja'alnahu hudan libani is'raila
ayah_english: And certainly We gave Musa the Scripture so (do) not be in doubt about receiving it And We made it a guide for the Children of Israel

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ فَلَا تَكُن فِي مِرۡيَةٖ مِّن لِّقَآئِهِۦۖ وَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ هُدٗى لِّبَنِيٓ إِسۡرَـٰٓءِيلَ
ayah_translit: walaqad atayna musa al-kitaba fala takun fi mir'yatin min liqaihi waja'alnahu hudan libani is'raila

ayah: وَجَعَلۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡ أَئِمَّةٗ يَهۡدُونَ بِأَمۡرِنَا لَمَّا صَبَرُواْۖ وَكَانُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا يُوقِنُونَ
ayah_translit: waja'alna min'hum a-immatan yahduna bi-amrina lamma sabaru wakanu biayatina yuqinuna
ayah_english: And We made from them leaders guiding by Our Command when they were patient and they were of Our Verses certain

ayah: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ يَفۡصِلُ بَيۡنَهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ فِيمَا كَانُواْ فِيهِ يَخۡتَلِفُونَ
ayah_translit: inna rabbaka huwa yafsilu baynahum yawma al-qiyamati fima kanu fihi yakhtalifuna
ayah_english: Indeed your Lord [He] will judge between them (on the) Day (of) Resurrection in what they used (to) [in it] differ

ayah: أَوَلَمۡ يَهۡدِ لَهُمۡ كَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِهِم مِّنَ ٱلۡقُرُونِ يَمۡشُونَ فِي مَسَٰكِنِهِمۡۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٍۚ أَفَلَا يَسۡمَعُونَ
ayah_translit: awalam yahdi lahum kam ahlakna min qablihim mina al-quruni yamshuna fi masakinihim inna fi dhalika laayatin afala yasma'una
ayah_english: Does it not guide [for] them (that) how many We have destroyed before them before them of the generations they walk about in their dwellings Indeed in that surely, are Signs Then do not they hear

ayah_english: Does it not guide [for] them (that) how many We have destroyed before them before them of the generations they walk about in their dwellings Indeed in that surely, are Signs Then do not they hear

ayah: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ أَنَّا نَسُوقُ ٱلۡمَآءَ إِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلۡجُرُزِ فَنُخۡرِجُ بِهِۦ زَرۡعٗا تَأۡكُلُ مِنۡهُ أَنۡعَٰمُهُمۡ وَأَنفُسُهُمۡۚ أَفَلَا يُبۡصِرُونَ
ayah_translit: awalam yaraw anna nasuqu al-maa ila al-ardi al-juruzi fanukh'riju bihi zar'an takulu min'hu an'amuhum wa-anfusuhum afala yub'siruna
ayah_english: Do not they see that We drive water to the land [the] barren then We bring forth thereby crops eat from it their cattle and they themselves Then do not they see

ayah_english: Do not they see that We drive water to the land [the] barren then We bring forth thereby crops eat from it their cattle and they themselves Then do not they see

ayah: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡفَتۡحُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ
ayah_translit: wayaquluna mata hadha al-fathu in kuntum sadiqina
ayah_english: And they say When (will be) this decision if you are truthful

ayah: قُلۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡفَتۡحِ لَا يَنفَعُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ إِيمَٰنُهُمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يُنظَرُونَ
ayah_translit: qul yawma al-fathi la yanfa'u alladhina kafaru imanuhum wala hum yunzaruna
ayah_english: Say (On the) Day (of) the Decision not will benefit those who disbelieve their belief and not they will be granted respite

ayah: فَأَعۡرِضۡ عَنۡهُمۡ وَٱنتَظِرۡ إِنَّهُم مُّنتَظِرُونَ
ayah_translit: fa-a'rid anhum wa-intazir innahum muntaziruna
ayah_english: So turn away from them and wait Indeed they (are) waiting
